---
order: 17
title:
  zh-CN: 拖拽缩放
  en-US: Zoom
---

## zh-CN

设置zoom为true，图表可以拖拽缩放。

## en-US


````jsx
import { Wcontainer, Wline } from '@alife/aisc-widgets';

let data = [
  {
    "name":"机房1",
    "data":[[1483372800000,1892],[1483459200000,7292],[1483545600000,5714],[1483632000000,5354],[1483718400000,2014],[1483804800000,22],[1483891200000,11023],[1483977600000,5218],[1484064000000,8759],[1484150400000,9981],[1484236800000,4533],[1484323200000,11398],[1484409600000,1064],[1484496000000,6494]]
  },
  {
    "name":"机房2",
    "data":[[1483372800000,11751],[1483459200000,4078],[1483545600000,2175],[1483632000000,12048],[1483718400000,1748],[1483804800000,10494],[1483891200000,9597],[1483977600000,4788],[1484064000000,2085],[1484150400000,492],[1484236800000,2965],[1484323200000,4246],[1484409600000,2160],[1484496000000,11877]]
  },
  {
    "name":"机房3",
    "data":[[1483372800000,1151],[1483459200000,4978],[1483545600000,4175],[1483632000000,10048],[1483718400000,6748],[1483804800000,1494],[1483891200000,6597],[1483977600000,3788],[1484064000000,3085],[1484150400000,5492],[1484236800000,7965],[1484323200000,5246],[1484409600000,3160],[1484496000000,10877]]
  },
  {
    "name":"机房4",
    "data":[[1483372800000,3892],[1483459200000,4292],[1483545600000,2714],[1483632000000,8354],[1483718400000,5014],[1483804800000,3222],[1483891200000,9023],[1483977600000,6218],[1484064000000,7759],[1484150400000,6981],[1484236800000,6533],[1484323200000,7398],[1484409600000,6064],[1484496000000,4494]]
  },
];

let options = {
  padding: [40, 5, 24, 44],
  xAxis: {
    type: 'time',
    mask: 'YYYY-MM-DD'
  },
  area: true,
  stack: true,
  zoom: true
};

class Demo extends React.Component{
  render(){
    return (
      <Wcontainer className="demos" height="300">
        <Wline config={options} data={data}/>
      </Wcontainer>
    );
  }
}

ReactDOM.render(<Demo />, mountNode);
````
